import React from 'react' import logo from '../../images/logo.png' import { Link as ScrollLink } from 'react-scroll' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Navbar = () => { const [nav, setNav] = React.useState(false) const changeBackground = () => { if(window.scrollY >= 50) { setNav(true) } else { setNav(false) } } window.addEventListener('scroll', changeBackground) return ( <>
